EmailTemplate.name: 18JulyWeb-Trends.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: 5 market trends independents need to know
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don't forget; there's still time to join us on July 18 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "The 5 Market Trends Independent Consultants Need to Know in 2013 <http://info.mbopartners.com/18JulyWebTrends_RegistrationPage.html>."
Do you ever feel like there aren't enough hours in the day to keep up with the market trends? Never fear! MBO Partners is inviting an expert in market trend analysis - Dorothy Price Hill, Senior Managing Director of Mid-Market Securities - to explain 5 big trends in today's market and why it's important for you to understand them to remain competitive. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/18JulyWebTrends_RegistrationPage.html>! ___________________________________ MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 e: webinar@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
